net.cloud.client.file.request.listener

Interface FileRequestListener<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the object acting as a file descriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockLoadRequestHandler
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface FileRequestListener<T>
    Listener to take action when a FileRequest has been served and is ready. The listener is provided the file descriptor object from the request. Useful for asynchronously requesting a file and then dealing with that file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void requestException(FileRequestException ex)
      Called when the handling of the request resulting in some exception.
      void requestReady(T file)
      Called when the request has been fulfilled.

    • Method Detail

      • requestReady

        void requestReady(T file)
        Called when the request has been fulfilled. This may take some custom action on the file.
        Parameters:
        file - The object representing the file

      • requestException

        default void requestException(FileRequestException ex)
        Called when the handling of the request resulting in some exception. This method is provided an exception which may have a cause wrapped into it. The purpose of this method is to allow for the exception to be detected and handled gracefully.
        This is a default method so that a listener may remain a functional interface if desired. The default behavior is to simply log the exception.
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception resulting from the handling of the request this listener is attached to
